titleStmt.title: A glimpse of God, or, A treatise proving that there is a God discovering the grounds of atheism, with arguments of divers sorts against atheists : shewing also, the unity of the Godhead, and the trinity of the persons ... / by ... Mr. Thomas Byrdall ...
titleStmt.author: Byrdall, Thomas, 1607 or 8-1662?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. Maxwel for Thomas Parkhurst ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
